job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtLooking for a System Engineer to help build and support the ultimate voicebased conversational AI Were looking for coders and creators with a refined code sense people whove built cool things but also enjoy scaling and operating those things and who feel proud seeing their code run well in productionltpgtltpgtThe ideal candidates would have professional experience on a stack serving millions of users be proficient with Python andor Golang and have some amount of experience either professional or personal in NLPltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtDesirable Skills Include ltstronggtMicroservices Architecture GoPythonML OpsShould be able to apply different tenants configuration through code as well as toolsltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtExperienceltstronggt35 years of experience in working with infrastructure as codeampnbspAt least 1 year in Python or GolangComfortable developing maintaining DevOps pipelinesStrong experience working with cloud services  AWS or GCP preferred Exposure to NLPAIML is a huge plusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtResponsibilitiesltpgtltpgt Be part of oncall rotation to respond to urgent bugs or production outagesltpgtltpgt Proactively identify and fix infrastructure bottlenecksampnbspltpgtltpgt Choosing tooling for and understanding of CI  CDGCP knowledgeltpgtltpgt Kubernetes In a production environmentDockerKnowledge of working in an Agile environment infrastructure As CodeDevelop integrate and support features in the core server stackltpgtltpgt Develop and support data pipeline and infrastructureltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis is onsite position post Covid in Austin TXltpgtltpgtPermanent position on W2 onlyltpgt
